title: Child Genius UK - DocuReality (2013-2015) small mp4 S01+S02+S03
description:
Child Genius UK - DocuReality on Brainy Kids (2013-2015) small mp4s 400p S01 to S03 complete

Highly gifted children aged between 7 to 12 
take part in a competition, run in association
 with British Mensa, to find the UK's annual child genius


Series 2015 Summary

Child Genius returns for a new series,
 as 20 of the country's cleverest kids battle 
it out to be crowned the brightest.

    Episode 1

    It's the General Knowledge and Memory Recall rounds, which require the ability to mentally navigate a map of the highways of Great Britain

    Episode 2

    It's the second stage of the contest, with rounds in maths and extraordinary memory. Can Holly bounce back? And does the ultra-competitive 11-year-old Mika want to win too badly?

    Episode 3

    The two rounds for the last 12 competitors are a comprehension and extreme spelling test. With each round seeing two children eliminated, leader Thomas is feeling the pressure.

    Episode 4


    It's the semi-final, and this round's tests are on logic and reasoning, and a complex memory test on human anatomy. Only five children can proceed to the final round.

    Episode 5


    It's the Child Genius final and the remaining five gifted youngsters take on the specialist subject round, including the curvature of space time and a history of cryptography
